layout.name: showLevelName
layout.title: Show level name
layout.tooltip: The name of the level that, when it is beaten, shows this scenery.

layout.name: showDelay
layout.title: Show Delay
layout.tooltip: Controls when the scenery appears. For example, if it's 1, it'll appear instantly when the level is beaten, if it's 2 it'll happen a bit later, etc.

layout.name: hideLevelName
layout.title: Hide level name
layout.tooltip: The name of the level that, when it is beaten, hides this scenery.

layout.name: hideDelay
layout.title: Hide Delay
layout.tooltip: Controls when the scenery disappears. For example, if it's 1, it'll disappear instantly when the level is beaten, if it's 2 it'll happen a bit later, etc.

layout.name: useSmoke
layout.title: Use smoke effect
layout.tooltip: Use the smoke effect instead of the default vanishing effect

layout.text: What are these? These control when this scenery appears or disappears. For example, if you put 'myCoolLevel' into the show level name, the scenery will be invisible until a level with the name of 'myCoolLevel' is beaten. The higher the delay, the later it actually happens. The hide options are similar, except they hide it instead of showing it.
